Description:
Featuring ponds, mills, traditional restaurants and a brook, the Ethno Village Stanisici is made up of old original buildings transported to this place from all over Bosnia. The resort includes bungalows, Hotel Pirg, Hotel Ras and Wellness and Spa Center Leonida.

All accommodations, either in small wooden huts or in the Hotel Pirg resembling a medieval castle, are equipped with lots of authentic furniture and have modern bathrooms. They are all air-conditioned and come equipped with a flat-screen satellite TV and free Wi-Fi.

The Ethno Village Stanisici is located on the edge of the city of Bijeljina in the plains of Semberija in the Republika Srpska.

A spa area with an outdoor pool, a hot tub, a sauna and a fitness area offers relaxation after a day of exploring the village and the area.

Traditional Bosnian specialities and international cuisine are served by waiters dressed in ancient costumes in the restaurants of the Ethno Village.

An on-site museum offers an impression about how life was like in Bosnia more than hundred years ago. Children can have fun on the playground or enjoy train rides around the lake. Children under the age of 12 can stay in the spa area until 6 pm.

Description:
Situated at 1550 metres above sea level along the skiing tracks of Mount Jahorina, Termag Hotel Jahorina offers 2 restaurants and a wellness centre with an indoor pool, sauna and Turkish bath.

The hotel provides free Wi-Fi, free private outdoor parking and there are ski instructors at your disposal.

The rooms at the Termag Jahorina feature cable TV with international channels, a safe, a minibar and hydromassage showers in the bathrooms.

Termag Hotels restaurant has a terrace. It serves local and international cuisine and macrobiotic dishes. You can unwind at the fireplace in the hall.

Quad tours of the mountain can be organised by the front desk. Weddings, conference and similar gatherings can be hosted in the hotels banquet hall for up to 350 persons. Description:
Situated next to the slopes, Hotel Nebojsa Jahorina offers heated rooms with free Wi-Fi and satellite TV. It has a sauna, an à la carte restaurant and the Winter Garden Lounge Area offering panoramic views of the mountains.

A ski storage room is available on site. The hotel offers ski lessons and possibilities for renting ski equipment.

Each room has a minibar and offers views of the surrounding mountains. The private bathroom comes with shower and a hairdryer.

Front desk operates 24 hours a day and provides room service, as well as currency exchange and laundry services. Samples of international cuisine can be tasted at the hotels restaurant.

The hotel is situated at 1600 metres above sea level on the sunny side of Mount Jahorina. Orlovaca Cave is approximately 25 km from the Nebojsa, and the capital city of Sarajevo is 30 km away.

Description:
Located 200 metres from a ski lift, Bed and Breakfast Vila Lala is located in Jahorina and provides heated accommodation with free WiFi access in public areas. A restaurant can also be found on site and ski equipment rental is available.

Rooms here come with a seating area and a flat-screen satellite TV. The private bathrooms are fitted with a shower, a hairdryer and come with free toiletries and slippers. A view of the mountains is available from each unit.

Vila Lala Bed and Breakfast also comprises a garden and a terrace. Other facilities offered at the property include a tour desk, ski storage and snowmobile rental. An array of activities can be enjoyed on site or in the surroundings, including hiking and cycling.

The centre of Sarajevo can be reached in 25 km, while Sarajevo Airport is located at a distance of 30 km. The property offers free parking.

Description:

All units come with satellite TV and most of them have a seating area. Private bathrooms include a shower and a hairdryer. Bed linen and towels are provided.

There is a 24-hour front desk, gift shop, and shops at the property. This hotel has a ski school and ski storage space and ski equipment hire and car hire are available. You can play table tennis, billiards and darts at this hotel, and the area is popular for skiing. Guests can also use the sauna or book a massage, both available at a surcharge.

Ogorjelica 2 is 100 metres from Hotel Dva Javora, while Ogorjelica I is 100 metres away. The nearest airport is Sarajevo International Airport, 22 km from the property. Payment before arrival via bank transfer is required. The property will contact you after you book to provide instructions.

Description:
Situated in the centre of tourist destination of Jahorina, Hotel Board is set only 150 metres from the ski slopes. The hotel features a Spa and Wellness Centre, a fitness centre and a games room. An à-la-carte restaurant and a bar are available on site.

All rooms feature modern furniture and red and beige tones. Each unit is fitted with a phone, a TV and a minibar. Private bathroom offers free toiletries, a hairdryer and slippers. Some rooms feature a balcony. Free Wi-Fi is provided in all hotel areas.

The hotels restaurant serves local and international cuisine and features a fireplace, while the bar offers a variety of drinks. The Wellness Centre features massages, saunas and steam baths, as well as an indoor swimming pool. Guests can rent bikes for free upon request. Ironing and laundry service can be arranged.

A grocery shop is available 250 metres away, while tennis and basketball courts can be found within 50 metres. Ice skating is available during the winter, while the hotel can organise skiing lessons.

Free private parking is available at the hotel. A bus stop can be found 12 km away, in Pale. Nearest train station is in Sarajevo, 28 km away. Sarajevo Airport can be reached in 30 km.
